globalAttributes.name: data-sly-use
globalAttributes.description: Initializes a helper object (defined in JavaScript or Java) and exposes it through a variable

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-unwrap
globalAttributes.description: Removes the host element from the generated markup while retaining its content

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-set
globalAttributes.description: Defines a new identifier with a pre-defined value

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-text
globalAttributes.description: Replaces the content of its host element with the specified text

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-attribute
globalAttributes.description: Adds attributes to the host element

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-element
globalAttributes.description: Replaces the element name of the host element

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-test
globalAttributes.description: Conditionally removes the host element and itâ€™s content

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-repeat
globalAttributes.description: Repeats an element multiple times based on the list that is specified

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-list
globalAttributes.description: Repeats the content of the host element for each enumerable property in the provided object

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-resource
globalAttributes.description: Includes the result of rendering the indicated resource through the sling resolution and rendering process

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-include
globalAttributes.description: Replaces the content of the host element with the markup generated by the indicated HTML template file (HTL, JSP, ESP etc.) when it is processed by its corresponding template engine

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-template
globalAttributes.description: Defines a template. The host element and its content are not output by HTL

globalAttributes.name: data-sly-call
globalAttributes.description: Calls a template defined with data-sly-template
